section.title: See the difference between two commits
section.para: To see the differences introduced between two commits you use the git diff command specifying the commits. For example, the following command shows the differences introduced in the last commit.

section.title: See the files changed by a commit
section.para:
To see the files which have been changed in a commit use the git diff-tree command. The name-only
tells the command to show only the names of the files.
